thread.section_title: FreedomVoice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FreedomVoice | www.freedomvoice.com
thread.title: Roger Madison / Executive Producer
thread.title_full: FreedomVoice reviewed by Roger Madison / Executive Producer

author: Roger Madison / Executive Producer
title: Roger Madison / Executive Producer
text:
I have over 30 years in customer service and 20 years experience in one of the toughest industries going automotive sales. I can tell you with complete confidence that my rep Victoria and the company she represents is top of the line bar none. They are professional, courteous and prompt every step of the way.
Do not waste your time with any other company! Believe me I know!
